Articles.Content:
How do you guys do that? :confused: :huh: I want it, please!

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Banners on profiles not banners on profilesg
Clarify? Do you mean your signature? Or your avatar? Or your profile pic?

First, you can edit the Topic by Edit and then "go advanced" :)

For the Banners, you probably mean the Ribbons
[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86422-WEB-KSP-Ribbon-Generator-v2-0-Dec-22-2014-Over-3-Million-Views[/url]! Edited November 23, 2015 by MalfunctionM1Ke
Do you mean Kerbal [URL="http://www.kerbaltek.com/ribbons"]Achievement Ribbons,[/URL] by any chance?
